things.desc: I've been a gamer since I can remember, I love playing games on PC. The games I currently play are Overwatch, TF2, and Rust.
I taught myself python when I was 15 and ever since then I've loved programming, this combined with my love of Linux I've done a bunch of projects and programs.
When I used to live in California I used to go snowboarding all the time, and since I moved to Utah I've loved going snowboarding. It's always a lot of fun.

Booted Linux when I was 14, since then I've been changing distro and partaking in different Linux forums looking for the best distro ever made (still not found it). I use Linux on my personal laptop and for schoool.
Maybe this is a bit unhealthy but I love drinking coffee, I will usually have at least a cup a day. I started drinking coffee when I was younger, it was a traditional drink in my family and
I had my own politics club in High School and I love learning and talking about politics. I like to stay up to date with what's happening in the world.
